page.title: 09Buxhall - Employment
page.content: 41% of local residents in paid employ- ment work in the area. Although the majority work in{agriculture}there are also some other{self employed}persons working from home. These include a freelance designer, an architect, and a specialised publisher. Many have come to the area attracted by the peace and the environment. The easy access to London (while generally being beyond daily commuting) is an advantage. 20% work in{Stowmarket}which, with its range of employment, lies within 10 minutes drive of the area. 5% work in {Bury St Edmunds}and 5% in{Ipswich, both towns easily reached by car. The improvements to the A45 have reduced journey times, particularly to Ipswich. 19% work elsewhere within 10 km, 5% within 10/25 km, and 5% over 25 km.
